As with all things, Antidote began as a little dream – a dream to change the world.

Life in today’s modern society is often stressful, complicated, dusty, and toxic. Like most of our fellow city-dwellers, we used to be oblivious to how poisonous our own lifestyles were; we ate processed food and lots of other junk, stayed up late, worked too much, seldom exercised. Caught up in the momentum of our busy urban lives, we forgot how to be kind to our bodies and our minds.

One day, we finally got sick and tired of always feeling so lumpy, lethargic and unhappy, and realised we needed to change. That led us to learning about real nutrition and experiencing for ourselves the overwhelmingly positive effects of living a healthier life. More specifically, we later discovered juicing and the importance of having our body take in enough micronutrients (for the uninitiated, micronutrients are essential nutrients that our body needs in order to function at an optimal level, and they are things like calcium, iron, magnesium, vitamin C, vitamin D and so on).

The culmination of that journey of change is Antidote. We started Antidote because we strongly believe that it’s possible for everyone to live a healthier and happier life, and our juices are designed to help everyone take the crucial first step towards exactly that, by allowing your body to get easy access to the nutrients and antioxidants it sorely needs.

But Antidote is more than just a juicing company. Our mission is to rise above the trends and fads of the health and fitness industry, and to impart real, practical nutritional knowledge through a series of interesting and carefully-designed programmes, all of them backed up by solid research in the nutritional field.
We can’t wait for you to join us on this journey of self-transformation, but more importantly, we hope that you’ll have fun and enjoy yourself!
